pullRequest.title: CATROID-468 Make visual placement option available in formula editor
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adapt FormulaEditorDiscardChangesTest so that it works correctly again with the new functionalty of the formula editor
Add further testcases in VisualPlacementBrickTest
Separate a GlideToBrickTest from VisualPlacementBrickTest because this one cannot be parameterized

commit.message:
CATROID-468 Make visual placement option available in formula editor

- Adapt FormulaEditorDiscardChangesTest so that it works correctly again with the new functionalty of the formula editor
- Add further testcases in VisualPlacementBrickTest and make old ones shorter
- Separate a GlideToBrickTest from VisualPlacementBrickTest because this one cannot be parameterized

afterCommit.message:
CATROID-468 Make visual placement option available in formula editor

- Adapt FormulaEditorDiscardChangesTest so that it works correctly again with the new functionalty of the formula editor
- Add further testcases in VisualPlacementBrickTest and make old ones shorter
- Separate a GlideToBrickTest from VisualPlacementBrickTest because this one cannot be parameterized
